column1: Illuin was one of the Two Lamps of the Valar
column3: filled by Varda and hallowed by Manwë in ancient days to bring light to the world. It was destroyed by Morgoth
column4: and where it fell it created the inland Sea of Helcar. It was set up in the northern part of Middle-earth while the other Lamp
column5: Ormal was set up in the south.
